review: its not living up to the hype.  so far most of the things i find interesting to watch cost more money or you have to sign up for prime (more money)  i guess ill be staying with netflix.
author: Robert

review: I have only had it a week but, I'm very happy with my Fire Stick so far.  It was easy to set up and provides quite a few viewing options.
author: Deuce

review: Had another brand of stick. It broke, decided to go w this one as it streams from devices as well
author: Allison

review: I enjoyed it. I was able to watch tv shows/episodes continuously. Unfortunately I left it in a hotel room while traveling and of course no one had seen it. I intend to order another one.
author: LADYDEFIANT

review: the remote is small color coding would be nice.  Some difficulty plugging into to the tv
author: Nancy

review: Love it love it love it
author: Charlotte hickman

review: The price was right,very happy with it.
author: richard omalley
